paper_title: Recovering the shape of a quantum caterpillar tree by two spectra
abstract: We show how to find the shape of an equilateral caterpillar tree using the spectra of the Neumann and the Dirichlet problems generated by the Sturm-Liouville equation on this tree. We prove that in the case of a caterpillar tree the spectra of the Neumann and Dirichlet problems uniquely determine the shape of the tree.
publication_venue: 9 pages, 1 figure. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2301.05939
